modmenu.descriptionTranslation.mine-ligh: Brings your Minecraft world to life with dynamic, real-time RGB lighting effects for your iCUE, Mystic Light, and OpenRGB-compatible peripherals.
option.mine-lights.enableMod.tooltip: Master switch to enable or disable all lighting effects.
option.mine-lights.refresh.label: Force Refresh Connection
option.mine-lights.refresh.tooltip: Check this and click 'Save & Close' to force a reconnection to the MineLights Proxy. Useful if the proxy was started after the game.
option.mine-lights.enableBiomeEffects.to: Changes the keyboard's background color based on the biome you're in.
Adds rain and thunderstorm lightning flash effects.
option.mine-lights.enableInWaterEffect.t: Changes the color of movement keys when submerged.
option.mine-lights.highlightMovementKeys: Keeps the movement keys lit with a default color.
message.mine-lights.refresh.feedback: Connection to MineLights Proxy has been refreshed.
